item.title: 制糖工厂 AI 小电拼登上「金充奖」年度榜单
item.guid: 制糖工厂-AI-小电拼登上「金充奖」年度榜单
item.description:
Yesterday, ChargerLAB released the 2026 "Golden Charge Award" product list. Among them, the AI Small Power Bank created by the Sugar Factory team once again became one of the most anticipated innovative products, showcasing a new breakthrough in the intelligence direction of the charging industry this year, with SDC (Software-Defined Charger) as its core concept. 昨天，充电头网发布 2026 年「金充奖」产品榜单，其中制糖工厂团队打造的 AI 小电拼再次成为最受关注的创新产品之一，以 SDC (Software-Defined Charger) 为核心理念，展示了今年充电行业在智能化方向上的全新突破。

The AI Small Power Bank is based on self-developed CanOS system and FluxAI "Free Flow" algorithm as its technical foundation, achieving a leap in dynamic power scheduling capabilities for the first time in consumer-grade multi-port chargers. AI 小电拼以 自研 CanOS 系统和 FluxAI「自由流」算法 为技术基础，首次在消费级多口充电器中实现了动态功率调度能力的跃升。

Its 160W physical specification can achieve an experience close to 250W through intelligent scheduling in multi-device scenarios, breaking through the fixed allocation mode of traditional multi-port fast charging. The ability to maintain continuous power during multi-device plugging and unplugging also solves the long-standing "power trap" problem in the industry. 其 160W 物理规格在多设备场景下可通过智能调度实现接近 250W 的体验表现，突破了传统多口快充的固定分配模式。在多设备插拔时保持不断电的能力，也解决了行业长期存在的「功率陷阱」问题。

The SDC (Software-Defined Charger) concept proposed by Sugar Factory is the core of the AI Small Power Bank. 制糖工厂提出的 SDC（Software-Defined Charger） 理念，是 AI 小电拼的核心。

Through full-mode OTA, users can "re-brain" their chargers, allowing the hardware to continuously gain new functions throughout its lifecycle; the OTW (Over The Wire & Wireless) capability enables "dumb devices" that were not originally smart to acquire status recognition and power scheduling capabilities, making them true intelligent nodes. 通过全模 OTA，用户可为充电器「换脑」，让硬件在生命周期内持续获得新功能； OTW (Over The Wire & Wireless) 能力则让原本不具备智能的「哑设备」获得状态识别与功率调度能力，使其成为真正意义上的智能节点。

The AI Small Power Bank also supports NFC intelligent control and App monitoring, allowing users to view real-time information such as power, voltage, and temperature, further enhancing the visual experience. Its 5-way blind plug design and 160W high-power output also give it higher adaptability among multi-device user groups. AI 小电拼还支持 NFC 智控与 App 监测，用户可实时查看功率、电压、温度等信息，进一步强化了可视化体验。5 路盲插设计与 160W 大功率输出，也让其在多设备用户群体中具备更高的适配性。

This year's Golden Charge Award generally shows trends such as high power density, protocol integration, visual interaction, and AI intelligent control, and the AI Small Power Bank has gone even further in this trend. 今年的金充奖整体呈现出高功率密度、协议融合、可视化交互与 AI 智控等趋势，而 AI 小电拼在这一趋势中走得更远。

制糖工厂提出的「Keep Patching」理念，也意味着其将持续通过软件迭代推动硬件能力进化，让充电器从静态工具迈向动态智能体。

item.title: 机主反映 iPhone 17 Pro 充电时发出电流声
item.guid: 机主反映-iPhone-17-Pro-充电时发出电流声
item.description:
据 MacRumors 报道，近日，部分今年上市的 iPhone 17 Pro 与 iPhone 17 Pro Max 用户集中反映，在设备充电时会从扬声器处听到类似「老式收音机」的电流噪声。相关讨论在 Reddit、苹果支持社区与多家科技媒体评论区持续发酵。

多名用户称，只要设备通过 USB‑C 有线充电，即便系统音量被调至 0，底部扬声器仍会发出轻微的嘶声或噪声；在部分场景下，滑动网页、播放音频并调低音量，或电量接近 100% 时，噪声会更明显。

也有用户指出，即使未连接充电器，在低音量播放时仍能听到类似干扰声。从多方报道来看，问题具有一定的共性：

  • 与充电方式强相关 ：有线充电最容易触发，而 MagSafe 无线充电噪声更轻或几乎不可闻；
  • 与电流与功率可能相关 ：部分用户更换低瓦数充电头或不同插座后，噪声有所减弱；
  • 与系统状态相关 ：当电池接近满电、或进行 UI 高频操作（如刷社交媒体）时，噪声更容易出现；
  • 非个别瑕疵 ：有用户更换新机后问题依旧，甚至有展示机出现类似情况，显示问题可能并非单一批次硬件故障。

苹果方面尚未发布公开声明，但多名用户称已与苹果支持沟通，问题已上报至工程团队，且内部倾向认为是软件层面导致，而非硬件损坏。不过，目前已发布的 iOS 更新尚未完全解决该问题。

在官方修复方案推出前，媒体与用户总结的临时缓解方式包括：

  • 尽量使用 MagSafe 无线充电；
  • 有线充电时尝试低瓦数充电器或更换插座；
  • 避免长时间满电状态；
  • 在录音或安静环境使用时拔掉充电线。

Gadget Hacks 指出，从现有迹象判断，该问题更可能是电源管理、音频路径或电磁屏蔽相关的软件或系统级交互导致，而非结构性硬件缺陷。随着 iOS 26 系列更新推进，外界普遍预期苹果将在后续版本中逐步修复。

item.title: 首个固态电池国家标准公开征求意见，「半固态」表述取消
item.guid: 首个固态电池国家标准公开征求意见，「半固态」表述取消
item.description:
日前，全国汽车标准化技术委员会就《电动汽车用固态电池 第 1 部分：术语和分类》公开征求意见，这标志着中国首个固态电池国家标准正式出炉。

此次发布的征求意见稿明确了固态电池的术语、分类和编码等基础内容。

根据电池单体内部传递离子方式的不同，电池被明确划分为 液态电池、混合固液电池和固态电池三类 。

值得注意的是，新标准中不再使用此前业内流行的「半固态电池」这一说法，而是将其归类至「混合固液」电池范畴。

在判定标准上，新国标提出了更为严格的技术门槛。征求意见稿规定，固态电池的失重率应不大于 0.5%（失重率越低表明电池内部液态成分越少）。

This indicator represents a significant increase compared to the "weight loss rate less than 1%" requirement in the "Solid-State Battery Determination Method" group standard issued by the China Society of Automotive Engineers in May this year, demonstrating the high requirements of national standards for the "solid-state" attribute of solid-state batteries. 这一指标相比今年 5 月中国汽车工程学会发布的《全固态电池判定方法》团体标准中「失重率小于 1%」的要求大幅提升，显示出国家标准对固态电池「固态」属性的高要求。

It is reported that the "Solid-State Batteries for Electric Vehicles" series of standards is intended to include four parts: terms and classification, performance specifications, safety specifications, and life specifications. 据悉，《电动汽车用固态电池》系列标准拟包含术语和分类、性能规范、安全规范、寿命规范 4 个部分。

Currently, the "Technical Specification for Solid Electrolytes for Electric Vehicle Solid-State Batteries" has also entered the drafting stage. The formulation of this series of standards will establish a unified technical benchmark for the industry, reduce the cost of market access rules, and promote the solid-state battery industry from laboratories to large-scale vehicle integration. 目前，《电动汽车固态电池用固体电解质技术规范》也已进入起草阶段。这一系列标准的制定将为行业确立统一的技术基准，降低市场准入的规则成本，推动固态电池产业从实验室走向规模化装车。

item.title: 小米 17 Ultra by Leica 入驻徕卡旗舰店
item.guid: 小米-17-Ultra-by-Leica-入驻徕卡旗舰店
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi officially announced that the Xiaomi 17 Ultra Leica Edition has officially entered Leica flagship stores and is currently on display at five flagship stores: Leica Beijing Guomao, Shenzhen MixC, Shanghai Xintiandi, Nanjing IFC, and Chongqing IFS. 昨天，小米官方宣布小米 17 Ultra 徕卡版正式进驻徕卡旗舰店，目前已在徕卡北京国贸、深圳万象城、上海新天地、南京国金中心及重庆 IFS 等五家旗舰店展出。

This model is displayed in the store alongside cameras such as the Leica M EV1 and Q3. This entry is based on the upgraded "strategic co-creation mode" between the two parties, with the Xiaomi 17 Ultra being the first product under this mode, featuring the mobile industry's first Leica APO certified telephoto lens. 该机型在店内与徕卡 M EV1、Q3 等相机同柜展示。此次入驻基于双方升级后的「战略共创模式」，小米 17 Ultra 是该模式下的首款产品，搭载了移动端首个徕卡 APO 认证长焦镜头。

According to previous reports, in response to recent user feedback regarding the loosening and abnormal noise of the "Master Zoom Ring" on the Xiaomi 17 Ultra Leica Edition, Xiaomi Mobile officially explained that the zoom ring design reserves active space to cope with deformation from drops and dustproof requirements, so slight displacement and sound when shaking are normal structural designs. 据此前报道，针对近期用户关于小米 17 Ultra 徕卡版「大师变焦环」松动及异响的反馈，小米手机官方解释称，变焦环设计上预留了活动空间以应对跌落形变与防尘需求，因此在晃动时出现轻微位移和声响属于正常结构设计。

item.title: 连续三年霸榜，马斯克官宣特斯拉 Model Y 蝉联全球销冠
item.guid: 连续三年霸榜，马斯克官宣特斯拉-Model-Y-蝉联全球销冠
item.description:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk posted on X yesterday, stating that the Tesla Model Y has been the world's best-selling car for the third consecutive year (2023-2025). 特斯拉 CEO 埃隆 · 马斯克昨天在 X 发文表示，特斯拉 Model Y 车型已连续第三年（2023-2025）蝉联全球最畅销汽车桂冠。

Musk wrote: "Tesla Model Y is now officially the world's best-selling car for the third consecutive year!" This achievement surpasses traditional sales leaders like the Toyota RAV4 and Corolla. 马斯克写道：「特斯拉 Model Y 现在已正式连续第三年成为全球最畅销的汽车！」这一成绩超越了丰田 RAV4 和卡罗拉等传统销量霸主。

Although Tesla's four major factories experienced production interruptions for several weeks and limited capacity in the first quarter of 2025 due to simultaneous Model Y production line upgrades to launch new versions, the model's full-year sales performance remained strong, ultimately successfully defending its title. 尽管 2025 年第一季度特斯拉四大工厂因同步进行 Model Y 产线升级以推出全新版本，导致生产工作中断数周、产能一度受限，但该车型全年销售表现依然强劲，最终成功卫冕。

Meanwhile, Tesla's total global production has exceeded 9 million vehicles, with its Shanghai factory in China contributing nearly half of the output. In terms of product planning, Musk revealed that the CyberCab without a steering wheel will go into production in 4 months; 与此同时，特斯拉在全球范围内的总产量已突破 900 万辆，其中中国上海工厂贡献了近一半的产量。在产品规划方面，马斯克透露不带方向盘的 CyberCab 将于 4 个月后投产；

Tesla's official Weibo also unveiled design sketches for the new Model Y Performance version. In addition, according to multiple foreign media reports, the possibility of Tesla vehicles supporting Apple Car Key (digital car key) is greatly increasing. 特斯拉官微也公开了新款 Model Y 高性能版的设计手稿。此外，据多家外媒报道，特斯拉汽车支持 Apple Car Key（数字车钥匙）的可能性正在大大增加。

item.title: 雷军因感冒推迟跨年直播，小米 YU7 拆解首秀延期
item.guid: 雷军因感冒推迟跨年直播，小米-YU7-拆解首秀延期
item.description:
Yesterday, Lei Jun, founder, chairman, and CEO of Xiaomi, posted on Weibo stating that due to a severe cold, the New Year's Eve live broadcast originally scheduled for last night would be postponed to 7 PM on January 3rd. 昨天，小米创始人、董事长兼 CEO 雷军在微博发文表示，因感冒病情严重，原定于昨晚举办的跨年直播将推迟至 1 月 3 日晚 7 点。

During this live broadcast, Lei Jun plans to invite engineers to disassemble the Xiaomi YU7 model on-site and conduct a "disassemble and chat" session. 在此次直播中，雷军计划邀请工程师现场拆解小米 YU7 车型，并进行「边拆边聊」。

He revealed that after watching SU7 disassembly videos online, he received many suggestions from netizens about "disassembling the YU7," and therefore decided to arrange this on-site disassembly session. 他透露，此前在网络上观看 SU7 拆解视频后，收到许多网友关于「拆解 YU7」的建议，因此决定安排此次现场拆解环节。

It is worth noting that due to health reasons, Lei Jun was absent from the Xiaomi 17 Ultra new product launch held on December 25th. The event was ultimately co-hosted by Xiaomi Group President Lu Weibing and other executives. 值得注意的是，受身体状况影响，雷军已缺席 12 月 25 日举行的小米 17 Ultra 新品发布会，该场发布会最终由小米集团总裁卢伟冰及其他高管共同主持。

item.title: Kimi 完成 5 亿美元 C 轮融资，账上现金储备超百亿
item.guid: Kimi-完成-5-亿美元-C-轮融资，账上现金储备超百亿
item.description:
According to LatePost, Moonshot AI, the developer of the AI tool Kimi, recently completed a $500 million Series C funding round, led by IDG with $150 million, with existing shareholders such as Alibaba, Tencent, and Wang Huiwen oversubscribing. The post-money valuation reached $4.3 billion. 据晚点 LatePost 报道，AI 工具 Kimi 开发商月之暗面近期完成 5 亿美元 C 轮融资，由 IDG 领投 1.5 亿美元，阿里、腾讯、王慧文等老股东超额认购，投后估值达到 43 亿美元。

It is reported that this financing round took less than two months, with a stronger-than-expected response from the primary market. Wang Huiwen's cumulative investment in Moonshot AI has reached $70 million. 据悉，此次融资用时不到两个月，一级市场反应超出预期，王慧文对月之暗面的累计投资已达 7000 万美元。

Yang Zhilin, founder and CEO of Moonshot AI, revealed in an internal letter released yesterday that the company currently holds over 10 billion RMB in cash reserves. This funding scale is comparable to Zhipu AI and MiniMax after their IPOs, meaning Moonshot AI does not need to rush for an IPO in the short term. 月之暗面创始人、CEO 杨植麟在昨天发布的内部信中透露，公司账上目前拥有超过 100 亿元人民币的现金储备。这一资金规模不输于 IPO 后的智谱和 MiniMax，意味着月之暗面短期内无需急于寻求 IPO。

Yang Zhilin stated that the Series C funding will primarily be used to aggressively expand GPU resources to accelerate the training and development of the K3 model. 杨植麟表示，C 轮融资将主要用于更激进地扩充显卡资源，以加速 K3 模型的训练和研发。

Regarding commercialization progress, Yang Zhilin revealed that the global number of paying users has grown by 170% in recent months. Since November last year, driven by the K2 Thinking large model, Moonshot AI's overseas large model API revenue has increased fourfold. 在商业化进展方面，杨植麟透露全球付费用户数月增速达 170%。自去年 11 月受 K2 Thinking 大模型带动，月之暗面在海外的大模型 API 收入增长了 4 倍。

Currently, the company's strategic focus is on the Agent layer, logic layer, and complex productivity-oriented task chains such as in-depth research and data analysis, deliberately avoiding entertainment and multimodal generation directions. 目前，公司的战略重心聚焦于 Agent 层、逻辑层以及深度研究、数据分析等偏生产力的复杂任务链路，刻意避开了生活娱乐和多模态生成方向。

Regarding the plan for 2026, Yang Zhilin proposed several key objectives: 针对 2026 年的规划，杨植麟提出了多项关键目标：

    The K3 model will catch up with the world's forefront in pre-training levels, and through technical improvements and scaling, its equivalent FLOPs will increase by at least an order of magnitude;

    In terms of products, it will pursue "intelligence ceiling" rather than absolute user numbers, committed to creating greater productivity value.

In addition, the company will significantly increase its option repurchase quota and double this year's incentive plan budget compared to last year. 此外，公司将大幅上调期权回购额度，并将今年的激励计划预算提升至去年的两倍。

item.title: 「海外版豆包」Dola 日活破千万
item.guid: 「海外版豆包」Dola-日活破千万
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, yesterday, ByteDance's overseas AI assistant Dola's daily active users exceeded 10 million. 据界面新闻报道，昨天，字节跳动旗下海外 AI 助手 Dola 日活跃用户数已突破千万。

Insiders revealed that starting from the second half of this year, Dola has shown significant growth momentum in Indonesia, Malaysia, Mexico, and other regions. 知情人士透露，从今年下半年开始，Dola 在印尼、马来西亚、墨西哥等地增长势头明显。

Data shows that since October this year, Dola has repeatedly ranked among the top 20 free app downloads on Google Play in the aforementioned countries and the UK, and has been the daily download champion in the Mexican market for a week straight. 数据显示，今年 10 月以来，Dola 多次跻身上述国家及英国的 Google Play 免费应用下载榜前 20 名，并在墨西哥市场连续一周蝉联单日下载冠军。

Dola was formerly Cici, launched in August 2023, primarily targeting emerging markets such as the Philippines, Indonesia, and Latin America. It is positioned as a one-stop AI assistant integrating conversational Q&A, writing translation, and image generation. At the end of this year, Cici was officially renamed Dola. Dola 前身为 2023 年 8 月上线的 Cici，主要面向菲律宾、印尼及拉美等新兴市场，定位为集对话问答、写作翻译及图像生成于一体的一站式 AI 助手。今年底，Cici 正式更名为 Dola。

Previously, ByteDance's domestic AI assistant Doubao's daily active users had exceeded 100 million. This means that ByteDance has successfully launched AI assistant products in both domestic and overseas markets, with the potential to replicate TikTok's growth path. 此前，字节跳动旗下国内 AI 助手豆包日活已破亿。这意味着字节跳动在国内和海外市场均已跑通 AI 助手产品，有望复制 TikTok 的增长路径。

However, the report points out that compared to TikTok's early days, Dola faces more intense competition from mature products like ChatGPT and Gemini overseas, requiring breakthroughs in functional differentiation and localization. 不过，报道指出，相比 TikTok 早期，Dola 在海外面临着来自 ChatGPT、Gemini 等成熟产品的更激烈竞争，需在功能差异化和本土化上寻求突破。

item.title: 鸿蒙智行发布 2025 智驾报告：活跃率达 98%，全年智驾里程 43.6 亿公里
item.guid: 鸿蒙智行发布-2025-智驾报告：活跃率达-98%，全年智驾里程-43.6-亿公里
item.description:
Yesterday, HarmonyOS Smart Travel officially released the "2025 Huawei Qiankun Smart Driving ADS Annual Travel Report." The report indicates that over 90% of users used the smart driving function throughout this year. According to the data disclosed in the report, HarmonyOS Smart Travel's core operational data in the smart driving sector for 2025 are as follows: 昨天，鸿蒙智行正式发布了《2025 华为乾崑智驾 ADS 年度出行报告》。报告指出，今年全年超过 9 成用户都在使用智驾功能。根据报告披露的数据，2025 年鸿蒙智行在智能驾驶领域的各项核心运营数据如下：

    The active rate of assisted driving users is as high as 98%;

    The cumulative assisted driving mileage for the entire year reached 4.36 billion kilometers, and the historical cumulative assisted driving mileage has reached 5.64 billion kilometers;

    Huawei Qiankun Smart Driving ADS cumulatively avoided possible collisions 1.656 million times throughout the year, with historical cumulative avoidance times exceeding 3.003 million;

    The cumulative assisted parking times for the entire year reached 250 million, with historical cumulative times reaching 330 million;

    The "Parking Space to Parking Space 2.0" function was used 25.248 million times, and currently, the number of available parking lots nationwide supporting this function exceeds 1 million.

Currently, HarmonyOS Smart Travel users can view their personalized travel assisted driving reports through the official App. The official statement also emphasizes that the ADS system is not autonomous driving, and drivers must always maintain active control of the vehicle . 目前，鸿蒙智行用户已可通过官方 App 查看个人专属的出行辅助驾驶报告。官方同时强调， ADS 系统并非自动驾驶，驾驶员仍需时刻保持对车辆的主动控制 。

item.title: 百度文心 AI 发布 2025 年度提示词
item.guid: 百度文心-AI-发布-2025-年度提示词
item.description:
Yesterday, Baidu Wenxin AI officially released its 2025 annual AI prompt word — "Work." Looking back at last year, Baidu's annual prompt word was "Answer," and this year, the official view is that "Work" might be one of the paths towards "Answer." 昨天，百度文心 AI 正式发布了 2025 年度 AI 提示词 ——「工作」。回顾去年，百度的年度提示词为「答案」，而今年官方认为，「工作」或许正是走向「答案」的路径之一。

In addition to the core keyword "Work," Baidu Wenxin AI also announced other high-frequency prompt words, including "Learning," "Self," "Improvement," and "Thought." These words collectively outline a slice of life where the public, amidst a mix of anxiety and hope, still pursues self-growth and intellectual depth this year; 除「工作」这一核心关键词外，百度文心 AI 还公布了其他高频提示词，包括「学习」、「自己」、「提升」和「思想」，这些词语共同勾勒出了今年大众在焦虑与希望交织中，依然追求自我成长与思想深度的生活切面；

"Life" is also an important dimension of concern, covering points of interest for all age groups, including specific scenarios such as "What kind of life do seniors expect?", "Which cities in China have no nightlife?", and "What are some small tips to improve happiness in life?". 「生活」也是重要的关注维度，涵盖了全年龄段的关注点，包括「老年人期待的生活是什么样的」、「中国没有夜生活的城市有哪些」、「生活中还有哪些能提升幸福感的小技巧」等具体场景。

Baidu Wenxin stated that these prompts witnessed the joys and sorrows of 2025, and also intertwined into a unique life scroll for everyone. 百度文心表示，这些提示词见证了 2025 年的喜怒哀乐，也交织成了一幅幅专属于每个人的人生画卷。

item.title: 荣耀手机发表 2026 新年致辞：海外销量占比首超 50%，AI 手机机器人今年量产
item.guid: 荣耀手机发表-2026-新年致辞：海外销量占比首超-50%，AI-手机机器人今年量产
item.description:
Yesterday, the Honor EMT management team delivered a 2026 New Year's address titled "Practical Work Forges a New Journey, Confidence Opens a New Future." The address reviewed Honor's performance in 2025 and disclosed the company's strategic plans for AI terminal ecosystem and globalization. 昨天，荣耀 EMT 管理团队发表了题为《实干铸就新征程 信心开启新未来》的 2026 年新年致辞。致辞回顾了荣耀在 2025 年的业绩表现，并披露了公司在 AI 终端生态及全球化方面的战略规划。

Looking back at 2025, Honor defined it as "the critical year for New Honor's second entrepreneurship." Data shows: 回顾 2025 年，荣耀将其定义为「新荣耀二次创业的关键之年」。数据显示：

  • Honor's global smartphone shipments exceeded 71 million units for the first time last year, an increase of 9%; 荣耀去年全球智能手机出货量首次突破 7100 万台，增长 9%；
  • Among them, overseas markets performed strongly, with sales growing by 47% and their share exceeding 50% for the first time; 其中，海外市场表现强劲，销量增长 47%，占比首次超过 50%；
  • In Latin America and the Middle East & Africa regions, shipments exceeded 10 million units, with market share exceeding 10% in 17 key countries. 在拉美和中东非地区，出货量突破千万台，在 17 个重点国家市场份额超过 10%。

In terms of product performance, the Honor Magic V5 gained an advantage in the foldable screen market with its 8.8mm thickness and 217g weight, boosting its share in the European foldable screen market to 34%. 在产品表现上，荣耀 Magic V5 以 8.8mm 厚度、217g 重量在折叠屏市场取得优势，助推其在欧洲折叠屏市场份额激增至 34%。

Meanwhile, the Honor Magic8 series and Honor 400 series (with global shipments exceeding 6 million units), and 500 series, all equipped with on-device AI, achieved significant market results. 同时，搭载端侧 AI 的荣耀 Magic8 系列及荣耀 400 系列（全球发货破 600 万台）、500 系列均取得了显著的市场成绩。

Regarding its AI strategy, Honor reiterated its goal of transforming into an "AI terminal ecosystem company." 针对 AI 战略，荣耀重申了向「AI 终端生态公司」转型的目标。

The address revealed that the first "Honor Robot Phone" under the Honor Alpha strategy – the Alpha mobile robot – is planned for mass production and release this year. This product is positioned as a personal life and production assistant with embodied intelligence. Furthermore, Honor has established the Alpha Lab, dedicated to innovating cutting-edge on-device intelligent technologies. 致辞中透露，荣耀阿尔法战略下的首款「荣耀 Robot Phone」—— 阿尔法手机机器人，计划于今年量产发布。该产品被定位为具备具身智能的个人生活生产助手。此外，荣耀已建成阿尔法实验室，致力于前沿端侧智能技术的创新。

In terms of ecosystem cooperation, Honor emphasized its "1x3xN" ecosystem strategy and stated that it has engaged in comprehensive strategic cooperation with companies such as Alibaba, BYD, Google, and Qualcomm, aiming to promote the development of the intelligent terminal industry cluster. 在生态合作方面，荣耀强调了「1x3xN」生态战略，并表示已与阿里、比亚迪、谷歌、高通等企业开展全面战略合作，旨在推动智能终端产业集群的发展。

Looking ahead to 2026, Honor's management anticipates that the AI wave will accelerate the restructuring of the industry landscape, but also pointed out industry uncertainties such as global memory supply and demand pressure leading to significant price increases. Honor stated that it will adhere to user-oriented, high-end, globalized, and youthful development directions, continuing to advance the building of a "World Class" brand. 面对 2026 年，荣耀管理层预判 AI 浪潮将加速重构产业格局，但也指出了全球内存供需承压导致价格大幅上涨等行业不确定性。荣耀表示将坚持用户导向、高端化、全球化及年轻化的发展方向，继续推进品牌「World Class」的构建。

item.title: 尤洋谈 Scaling Law 困境：AI 未来不是要「省算力」，而是要能「吃下」更多算力
item.guid: 尤洋谈-Scaling-Law-困境：AI-未来不是要「省算力」，而是要能「吃下」更多算力
item.description:
According to Xinzhiyuan, You Yang, Presidential Young Professor at the National University of Singapore and founder of Luoshen Technology, published an in-depth article yesterday titled "The Bottleneck of Intelligent Growth," discussing the Scaling Law dilemma currently faced by the AI industry and its future development direction. 据新智元报道，新加坡国立大学校长青年教授、潞晨科技创始人尤洋昨天发表深度文章《智能增长的瓶颈》，探讨了 AI 行业当前面临的 Scaling Law 困境及未来发展方向。

The article points out that the technical essence of large AI models over the past 10 years has been to convert electrical energy into reusable intelligence through computational processes. 文章指出，过去 10 年 AI 大模型的技术本质是将电力能源通过计算过程转化为可复用的智能。

The core problem currently facing the industry is not the depletion of computing power, but rather that the "digestive capacity" of existing computing paradigms – including model architectures, loss functions (Loss), and optimization algorithms – for computing power is declining. This means that our current methods cannot fully utilize continuously growing computing power to achieve a proportional leap in intelligence. 当前行业面临的核心问题并非算力枯竭，而是现有的计算范式 —— 包括模型架构、损失函数（Loss）及优化算法对算力的「消化能力」正在下降。这意味着，我们现有的方法无法充分利用持续增长的算力来实现同比例的智能跃迁。

This view echoes the recent judgments of industry giants. 这一观点与近期行业巨头的判断相呼应。

  • Ilya Sutskever has publicly stated that simply piling up pre-training computing power is entering a plateau phase; Ilya Sutskever 曾公开表示单纯堆砌预训练算力正进入平台期；
  • Yann LeCun believes that the current large language model path cannot reach true AGI; Yann LeCun 认为当前的大语言模型路径无法触达真正的 AGI；
  • OpenAI CEO Sam Altman also implicitly admitted that simply increasing GPUs can no longer yield a proportional increase in intelligence. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 也曾含蓄承认，仅靠增加 GPU 已无法换回同比例的智能提升。

You Yang redefined the meaning of "bottleneck" in the article, emphasizing the need to distinguish between "efficiency improvement" and "intelligence ceiling improvement." 尤洋在文中重新界定了「瓶颈」的含义，强调需区分「效率提升」与「智能上限提升」。

The former, such as pruning, distillation, and low-precision training, aims to achieve the same effect with fewer resources, which is crucial for engineering implementation; while the latter focuses on how to train models with stronger capabilities and better generalization under the same total floating-point computation constraint. 前者如剪枝、蒸馏、低精度训练等技术，旨在用更少资源达到相同效果，对工程落地至关重要；而后者则关注在相同的浮点计算总量约束下，如何训练出能力更强、泛化性更好的模型。

He mentioned that the essence of Nvidia GPUs is parallel computing, and the reason Transformer excels is precisely because its parallel computing characteristics perfectly match the GPU's hardware architecture. 他提到，英伟达 GPU 的本质是并行计算机，Transformer 之所以胜出，正是因为其并行计算特性完美匹配了 GPU 的硬件架构。

However, as computing power continues to grow, the real bottleneck lies in how to enable AI models to "consume" more energy and convert it into intelligence per unit of time, rather than merely pursuing computing power savings. 然而，当算力继续增长时，真正的瓶颈在于如何让AI模型在单位时间内「吃下」更多能源并转化为智能，而非单纯追求节省算力。

Regarding future paths, the article proposes several directions worth noting: 针对未来路径，文章提出了几个值得关注的方向：

    Exploring higher numerical precision (e.g., transitioning from FP16 to FP32 or even FP64);

    Adopting higher-order optimizers to provide better parameter update paths;

    Designing more scalable model architectures or Loss functions, not with throughput as the sole objective, but with model performance under extreme computing power as the standard;

    Conducting more thorough training and hyperparameter search.

You Yang concluded that if the core problem of the past 10 years was "how to obtain more computing power," then the next stage's problem will be "how to truly convert this computing power into intelligence." 尤洋总结认为，如果说过去 10 年的核心问题是「如何获得更多算力」，那么下一阶段的问题将变成「如何把这些算力真正转化为智能」。

item.title: 前索尼高管呼吁建立统一跨平台游戏标准
item.guid: 前索尼高管呼吁建立统一跨平台游戏标准
item.description:
According to NotebookCheck, former Sony executive Shawn Layden recently elaborated on his predictions for the future of the gaming industry in several interviews: 据 NotebookCheck 报道，前索尼高管 Shawn Layden 近日在多场采访中集中阐述了他对游戏行业未来的判断：

Next-generation consoles will further align with PCs, but platform-exclusive games will not disappear in the short term; if the industry wants to break through the console generation cap of approximately 250 million units, it must establish a "unified game format" similar to VHS and DVD. 次世代主机将进一步向 PC 化靠拢，但平台独占游戏仍不会在短期内消失；若行业想突破约 2.5 亿台的主机世代上限，则必须建立类似 VHS、DVD 的「统一游戏格式」。

Layden stated in an interview with YouTube channels Pause for Thought and Naomi Kyle that although the overall size of the gaming industry has reached $250 billion, the actual installed base of consoles has consistently remained around 250 million units for several generations. Layden 在接受 YouTube 频道 Pause for Thought 与 Naomi Kyle 采访时表示，尽管游戏产业整体规模已达 2500 亿美元，但真正的主机装机量在过去数个世代始终停留在约 2.5 亿台左右。

He pointed out that this "ceiling" has not changed due to industry growth, with data from eras like PS1, Sega Saturn, and N64 all being close to this figure, while Wii's brief breakthrough stemmed from the inclusion of non-traditional players. 他指出，这一「天花板」并未因行业增长而改变，PS1、Sega Saturn、N64 等时代的数据均与这一数字接近，而 Wii 的短暂突破则源于非传统玩家的加入。

He believes that the console market is difficult to expand because each platform remains in a closed ecosystem similar to Betamax. 他认为，主机市场之所以难以扩大，是因为各平台仍处于类似 Betamax 的封闭生态中。

Layden cited Sony's Betamax format losing to VHS as an example, pointing out that VHS won because it was licensed to multiple manufacturers for production, leading to rapid popularization. He emphasized that the success of audio-visual formats like CD, DVD, and Blu-ray also relied on industry alliances and unified standards. Layden 以索尼 Betamax 格式败给 VHS 为例指出，VHS 之所以胜出，是因为其授权给多家厂商生产，从而迅速普及。他强调，CD、DVD、蓝光等影音格式的成功也依赖产业联盟与统一标准。

Based on this, he proposed that the gaming industry should establish an alliance to create a unified, cross-brand, cross-hardware game format, possibly developed based on PC architecture (such as the Linux kernel), and allow different manufacturers to produce compatible devices through licensing, so that players no longer need to buy specific consoles for specific games. 基于此，他提出游戏行业应建立联盟，打造一种跨品牌、跨硬件的统一游戏格式，可能基于 PC 架构（如 Linux 内核）开发，并通过授权方式让不同厂商生产兼容设备，使玩家无需再为特定游戏购买特定主机。

However, Layden also emphasized that platform exclusivity still holds significant value. Citing "Uncharted" as an example, he pointed out that strong exclusive titles bring brand prestige to platforms and will not disappear in the short term. He believes that large-scale multiplayer games should be cross-platform, but single-player narrative titles will maintain an exclusive strategy. 不过，Layden 同时强调，平台独占仍具有重要价值。他以《神秘海域》为例指出，强独占作品能为平台带来品牌光彩，短期内不会消失。 他认为大型多人游戏应跨平台，但单机叙事类作品仍将保持独占策略。

Regarding console form factors, he predicts that future devices will be more like PCs, and there might even be a situation where multiple manufacturers produce PlayStation consoles. He bluntly asked, "How much longer can we live in a world of dedicated consoles?" and suggested that the industry might eventually move towards a hardware ecosystem as "ubiquitous as toasters." 在主机形态方面，他判断未来设备将更像 PC，甚至可能出现由多家厂商制造 PlayStation 主机的情况。他直言：「我们还能在专用主机的世界里生活多久？」并指出行业最终可能走向类似「像面包机一样普及」的硬件生态。

Currently, Microsoft is promoting its "play games anywhere" strategy, Sony continues to port first-party games to PC, while Nintendo still adheres to a closed ecosystem. 目前，微软正推动「无处不玩游戏」战略，索尼也持续将第一方游戏移植至 PC，而任天堂仍坚持封闭生态。

item.title: 💡 梦工厂联合创始人谈 AI 泡沫：赢家不止一个，但并非人人能赢
item.guid: 💡-梦工厂联合创始人谈-AI-泡沫：赢家不止一个，但并非人人能赢
item.description:
According to Business Insider, Jeffrey Katzenberg, co-founder of DreamWorks and current partner at venture capital firm WndrCo, recently stated on the podcast "Sourcery" that there will be no "zero-sum game" in the AI field, but 2026 will be the industry's "year of reckoning." 据 《商业内幕》 报道，梦工厂联合创始人、现任风险投资公司 WndrCo 合伙人 Jeffrey Katzenberg 近日在播客节目《Sourcery》中表示，AI 领域不会出现「零和博弈」，但 2026 年将成为行业的「清算之年」。

Katzenberg believes that regardless of whether there is a bubble, the AI field will not evolve into a winner-take-all situation, but not everyone will win either. Katzenberg 认为，无论是否存在泡沫，AI 领域都不会演变成赢家通吃的局面，但也并非所有人都能获胜。

He predicts that next year the market will undergo a strict screening process, and this reckoning will distinguish between two types of companies: those that truly leverage AI to produce tangible results and implement them efficiently, and those that are bubble creators unable to generate substantial value. 他预测明年市场将进行一次严格筛选，这次清算将区分出两类公司：一类是真正利用 AI 产出实际成果并以高效方式落地的企业，另一类则是无法产生实质价值的泡沫制造者。

When evaluating AI startups, Katzenberg and the WndrCo team adhere to a "people-first" investment strategy. 在评估 AI 初创公司时，Katzenberg 与 WndrCo 团队坚持「以人为本」的投资策略。

ChenLi Wang, a general partner at WndrCo, explained on the show that the company values the founding team's originality, creative strengths (spikes), and complementary collaboration among members, rather than solely relying on AI benchmark data. WndrCo 普通合伙人 ChenLi Wang 在节目中解释称，公司更看重创始团队的独创性、创造力特长（spikes）以及成员间的协作互补，而非单纯依赖 AI 基准测试数据（benchmarks）。

They believe that current benchmarks are like the criticized "standardized tests," which can easily obscure true human intelligence and magic. 他们认为目前的基准测试如同被诟病的「标准化考试」，容易掩盖人类真正的智慧与魔法。

Wang likens current AI benchmarks to long-criticized standardized tests, believing they might stifle originality. Currently, WndrCo has invested in well-known tech companies such as Cursor, Harvey, and Figma. Wang 将目前的 AI 基准测试比作被诟病已久的标准化考试，认为其可能扼杀独创性。目前，WndrCo 已投资了 Cursor、Harvey 和 Figma 等知名科技公司。

This investment philosophy also reflects the industry's growing skepticism towards AI benchmarks. 这一投资哲学也反映了行业内对 AI 基准测试日益增长的质疑。

The report points out that several researchers, including Dean Valentine, CEO of AI safety startup ZeroPath, believe that current model scores often overestimate superficial performance and fail to reflect differences in practical applications. New models released since June last year have not shown significant breakthroughs in abilities such as solving real bugs. 报道指出，包括 AI 安全初创公司 ZeroPath CEO Dean Valentine 在内的多位研究者认为，目前的模型评分往往高估了表面性能，而无法反映实际应用中的差异，自去年 6 月以来发布的新模型在解决实际 bug 等能力上并未有显著突破。

item.title: 0.8 米高、关节比鸡蛋小，稚晖君发布年轻人的第一台机器人启元 Q1
item.guid: 0.8-米高、关节比鸡蛋小，稚晖君发布年轻人的第一台机器人启元-Q1
item.description:
Yesterday, Peng Zhihui (Zhihuijun), Chairman of Sunway New Materials, Bilibili Top 100 UP creator, and co-founder and CTO of Zhimeta Robotics, officially launched the new brand "Sunway Qiyuan" and its first product, "Qiyuan Q1." 昨天，上纬新材董事长、哔哩哔哩百大 UP 主、智元机器人联合创始人兼 CTO 彭志辉（稚晖君）正式发布了新品牌「上纬启元」及其首款产品「启元 Q1」。

This is a small-sized, full-body force-controlled humanoid robot, positioned as "everyone's first personal robot." It stands approximately 0.8 meters tall, has a storage mode length of about 0.5 meters, can be folded into a 30 to 35L backpack, and its volume and weight are about 1/8 of a full-sized robot. 这是一款小尺寸全身力控人形机器人，定位为「属于每个人的第一个个人机器人」，站立高度约 0.8 米，收纳模式长度约 0.5 米，可折叠装入 30 至 35L 的双肩包中，体积和重量约为全尺寸机器人的 1/8。

On the technical front, the product claims to have overcome the challenge of miniaturizing high-performance humanoid robot joints, reducing QDD (Quasi-Direct Drive) joints to a size "smaller than an egg," while retaining the same force control performance and high dynamic response capabilities as full-sized models. 技术层面，该产品宣称攻克了高性能人形机器人关节微型化的难题，将 QDD（准直驱驱动器）关节缩小至「比鸡蛋还小」的尺寸，同时保留了与全尺寸机型相同的力控性能与高动态响应能力。

Furthermore, thanks to Sunway New Materials' high-performance composite material technology, Qiyuan Q1 boasts extremely high drop resistance. In terms of software and ecosystem, Sunway Qiyuan has defined three core application scenarios: 此外，得益于上纬新材的高性能复合材料工艺，启元 Q1 具备极高的耐摔性。软件与生态方面，上纬启元明确了三大核心应用场景：

    Research and Education : Open full SDK and HDK interfaces, support expansion modules, and lower R&D barriers;

    Makers and Geeks : Fully open-source exterior structure, supports 3D printing customization (e.g., anime character cosplay); users can arrange action logic using a block-building, low-code approach through the "Zhimeta Lingchuang" platform;

    Home Companionship : Built-in "Zhimeta Lingxin" AI platform, supports natural language interaction, encyclopedia Q&A, and English tutoring, and utilizes flexible impedance control technology to ensure safe interaction.

This launch also marks the substantial implementation of business synergy between Zhimeta Robotics and Sunway New Materials. In July this year, the company owning Zhimeta Robotics proposed to acquire at least 63.62% of Sunway New Materials' shares, which sparked market speculation about a "backdoor listing." Zhimeta Robotics later responded that the action was solely for acquiring a controlling stake. 此次发布也是智元机器人与上纬新材业务协同的实质性落地。今年 7 月，智元机器人所属公司拟收购上纬新材至少 63.62% 股份，曾引发市场关于「借壳上市」的质疑，随后智元机器人回应称该行动仅为收购控股权。

item.title: 源 Yuan 3.0 Flash 开源：40B 多模态模型以更少算力实现更高推理效率
item.guid: 源-Yuan-3.0-Flash-开源：40B-多模态模型以更少算力实现更高推理效率
item.description:
Yesterday, the YuanLab.ai team officially open-sourced and released the multimodal foundational large model "Yuan 3.0 Flash." 昨天，YuanLab.ai 团队正式开源发布多模态基础大模型「源 Yuan 3.0 Flash」。

The model adopts a 40B parameter scale and a sparse Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) architecture, activating only about 3.7B parameters per inference, aiming to achieve higher inference efficiency with lower computational costs and is systematically optimized for enterprise-level scenarios. 该模型采用 40B 参数规模与稀疏混合专家（MoE）架构，单次推理仅激活约 3.7B 参数，旨在以更低算力成本实现更高推理效率，并面向企业级场景进行系统优化。

It is worth noting that the team proposed a reinforcement learning training method called RAPO (Reflection-aware Adaptive Policy Optimization) and introduced a Reflection Inhibition Reward Mechanism (RIRM). Experiments show that in mathematics, science, and complex reasoning tasks, the model can reduce the number of inference tokens by up to approximately 75% while maintaining accuracy. 值得关注的是，团队提出了强化学习训练方法 RAPO（Reflection-aware Adaptive Policy Optimization），并引入反思抑制奖励机制（RIRM），实验显示，在数学、科学与复杂推理任务中，模型在保持精度的同时可将推理 token 数量减少最高约 75%。

In multimodal and language reasoning benchmarks, its accuracy is close to Qwen3-VL235B-A22B (235B) and DeepSeek-R1-0528 (671B), but its token consumption is only about 1/4 to 1/2 of the latter. 在多模态推理与语言推理基准中，其精度接近 Qwen3-VL235B-A22B（235B）与 DeepSeek-R1-0528（671B），但 token 消耗仅为后者的约 1/4 至 1/2。

The Yuan 3.0 series will include Flash, Pro, and Ultra versions, with parameter scales ranging from 40B to 1T. It has been fully open-sourced, including model weights (16bit and 4bit), technical reports, training methods, and evaluation results, supporting community retraining and industry customization. 源 3.0 系列将包含 Flash、Pro、Ultra 等版本，参数规模从 40B 覆盖至 1T，已全面开源，包含模型权重（16bit 与 4bit）、技术报告、训练方法与评测结果，支持社区二次训练与行业定制。

The team states that they hope to drive large models from "capability demonstration" to "large-scale deployment," achieving the next generation of foundational models with "less computing power and higher intelligence." 团队称，希望推动大模型从「能力展示」走向「规模化落地」，实现「更少算力、更高智能」的下一代基础模型形态。

item.title: 夸克 AI 眼镜发布 5+ 项功能更新，覆盖大模型多意图理解执行、蓝环支付等
item.guid: 夸克-AI-眼镜发布-5+-项功能更新，覆盖大模型多意图理解执行、蓝环支付等
item.description:
Yesterday, Quark AI Glasses, equipped with the Qianwen AI assistant, received their first feature update. Users can now complete OTA upgrades via the Quark AI Glasses App. The iterated 1.2.1 system version adds five new features, including recording summaries, graphic memos, multi-intent understanding and execution, and "Blue Ring Payment." 昨天，搭载千问 AI 助手的夸克 AI 眼镜昨天迎来首次功能更新。用户现可通过夸克 AI 眼镜 App 完成 OTA 升级，迭代后的 1.2.1 系统版本新增了录音纪要、图文备忘录、多意图理解执行及「蓝环支付」等五项新功能。

The highlight of this upgrade lies in the deep application of large model capabilities. The updated Quark AI Glasses support multi-intent understanding and execution, capable of handling 2-3 complex tasks at once. 此次升级的亮点在于大模型能力的深度应用，更新后的夸克 AI 眼镜支持多意图理解与执行，能够一次性处理 2-3 个复合任务。

In recording scenarios, the device supports far-field sound pickup within a 10-meter range, possesses the ability to distinguish different speakers, and can extract AI key points based on recording content to automatically generate to-do items. 在记录场景中，设备支持 10 米范围内的远场收音，具备区分不同说话对象的能力，并能基于录音内容进行 AI 要点提炼，自动生成待办事项。

Furthermore, this update expands the number of languages supported by the portable translator to 89 and optimizes features for high-frequency usage scenarios such as travel reminders and music playback. 此外，本次更新还将随身翻译支持的语言数量扩充至 89 种，并针对出行提醒、音乐播放等高频使用场景进行了功能优化。

item.title: 2026 年元旦铁路运输开启，预计发送旅客 7780 万人次
item.guid: 2026-年元旦铁路运输开启，预计发送旅客-7780-万人次
item.description:
According to China Railway, the railway transport for the 2026 New Year's Day holiday officially commenced yesterday. National railways are expected to transport 77.8 million passengers during the 5-day transport period, with January 1st being the peak passenger flow day. 据中国铁路消息，2026 年元旦假期铁路运输已于昨天正式启动，全国铁路将在为期 5 天的运输周期内预计发送旅客 7780 万人次，其中 1 月 1 日为客流最高峰。

The railway department stated that it will enhance transport capacity in key areas and during peak periods by adding temporary passenger trains, coupling EMU trains, attaching additional carriages to ordinary trains, and operating overnight high-speed trains, to maximize the satisfaction of passengers' holiday travel needs. 铁路部门表示，将通过加开临时旅客列车、动车组列车重联、普速列车加挂车辆、开行夜间高铁等方式提升重点地区与高峰时段的运力供给，以最大限度满足旅客假日出行需求。

On December 31, 2025, and January 1, 2026, overnight high-speed sleeper trains will be added on routes such as Beijing West to Shenzhen North, Nanning East, Zhanjiang West, Zhuhai, Chaoshan, Kunming South, and Hong Kong West Kowloon, as well as Shanghai Hongqiao to Foshan West, Guangzhou South, Zhuhai, and Hong Kong West Kowloon. 2025 年 12 月 31 日及 2026 年 1 月 1 日，北京西至深圳北、南宁东、湛江西、珠海、潮汕、昆明南、香港西九龙，以及上海虹桥至佛山西、广州南、珠海、香港西九龙等区间均将加开夕发朝至的高铁动卧列车。

The railway department also emphasized service guarantee measures, including dynamic analysis of railway 12306 pre-sale and standby ticket data, strengthening real-time monitoring of ticket availability, balancing long-distance and short-distance demands, and providing special services for key passengers such as the elderly, children, sick, disabled, and pregnant. 铁路部门同步强调服务保障措施，包括动态分析铁路 12306 预售票与候补数据、加强票额实时监控、兼顾长短途需求，并为老幼病残孕等重点旅客提供专项服务。

At the same time, the railway 12306 website and client remain the only official ticket purchasing channels. Passengers are reminded to purchase tickets exclusively through official channels to avoid risks caused by third-party platforms. 同时，铁路 12306 网站及客户端仍为唯一官方购票渠道，提醒旅客务必通过官方途径购票，避免因第三方平台导致风险。

Regarding cross-border transport, Guangzhou-Shenzhen-Hong Kong High-Speed Rail cross-border trains and China-Laos, China-Mongolia, China-Russia, and China-Vietnam international passenger trains will be organized as needed to meet cross-border tourism and shopping demands during the holiday. 在跨境运输方面，广深港高铁跨境列车及中老、中蒙、中俄、中越国际旅客列车将按需组织开行，以满足假日期间跨境旅游与购物需求。

In addition, the railway department will continue to operate public welfare "slow trains," rural revitalization trains, and special tourist trains such as the "Panda Express" and "Yichun" to promote holiday economic development. 此外，铁路部门还将继续开行公益性「慢火车」、乡村振兴列车及「熊猫专列」「伊春号」等特色旅游列车，推动假日经济发展。

The railway department reminds passengers to pay attention to weather changes and passenger flow at stations and on trains, allow ample time to enter the station and board, strictly adhere to ticket information, avoid violations such as "buying short and riding long," and jointly maintain good travel order. 铁路部门提醒旅客关注天气变化与站车客流情况，预留充足时间进站乘车，严格按票面信息乘车，避免「买短乘长」等违规行为，共同维护良好出行秩序。

item.title: 大麦「本人票」上线：观演人可独立查看实名门票
item.guid: 大麦「本人票」上线：观演人可独立查看实名门票
item.description:
Starting January 1st, Damai officially launched the "My Ticket" service, allowing attendees to independently view their personal real-name tickets without relying on screenshots from the ticket purchaser. This feature applies to strongly real-name projects sold on the Damai platform and exclusively represented by Damai, covering various categories such as concerts, music festivals, sports events, and theater performances. 1 月 1 日起，大麦正式上线「本人票」服务，观演人无需再依赖购票人截图即可独立查看个人实名制门票。该功能适用于大麦平台开售、且由大麦总代的强实名制项目，覆盖演唱会、音乐节、体育赛事及剧场演出等多类目。

Reports show that audience members only need to complete real-name authentication for their Damai account, and after the performance tickets are issued, they can view their personal tickets in "My Wallet - My Tickets". At the same time, the "My Tickets" page will integrate a navigation entry function, providing in-venue navigation services to help users quickly enter and find their seats. 报道显示，观演人只需完成大麦账号的实人认证，待演出出票后，即可在「我的票夹 – 本人票」中查看个人门票。同时，「本人票」页面将接入导航入场功能，提供场内导航服务，帮助用户快速入场与落座。

Damai revealed that the service had already started grayscale testing in early December last year, and has been applied in 95 projects and 166 performances, with over 360,000 cumulative views and uses. Test projects include Li Yuchun's 2025 Tour Concert (Chongqing Station) and the 2025 ITTF Mixed Team World Cup in Chengdu. 大麦方面透露，该服务早在去年 12 月初已启动灰度测试，已在 95 个项目、166 场演出中应用，累计超 36 万人查看使用。测试项目包括李宇春 2025 巡回演唱会（重庆站）及 2025 年成都国际乒联混合团体世界杯等。

item.title: 今天起，数字人民币钱包有利息了
item.guid: 今天起，数字人民币钱包有利息了
item.description:
According to Beike Finance, state-owned banks such as ICBC, Agricultural Bank of China, China Construction Bank, Bank of Communications, and Postal Savings Bank of China issued announcements yesterday, stating that starting today, banks will pay interest on the balances of digital RMB real-name wallets opened for customers, calculated at the posted interest rate for demand deposits. 据贝壳财经报道，工行、农行、建行、交行、邮储银行等国有银行于昨天发布公告，从今天起，银行将为客户开立的数字人民币实名钱包余额按照活期存款挂牌利率计付利息。

According to the announcement, digital RMB wallets are divided into four categories. Among them, Category 1, Category 2, and Category 3 wallets are real-name wallets, included in the scope of interest calculation, and their interest accrual rules are consistent with demand deposits; Category 4 wallets are non-real-name wallets, and their balances do not accrue interest . 根据公告，数字人民币钱包分为四类。其中，一类、二类、三类钱包属于实名钱包，纳入计息范畴，计结息规则与活期存款一致； 四类钱包为非实名钱包，其余额不计付利息 。

The implementation of this interest calculation rule is the realization of relevant policies from the People's Bank of China. 此次计息规则的实施是对中国人民银行相关政策的落地。

The People's Bank of China explicitly stated in the "Action Plan on Further Strengthening the Digital RMB Management Service System and Related Financial Infrastructure Construction" issued on December 29 that the digital RMB will usher in an interest-bearing era. The digital RMB adopts a two-tier operational architecture, issued by the central bank, with commercial banks and other operating institutions responsible for exchange and management. 央行于 12 月 29 日发布的《关于进一步加强数字人民币管理服务体系和相关金融基础设施建设的行动方案》中明确，数字人民币将开启计息时代。数字人民币采用双层运营架构，由央行发行，商业银行等运营机构负责兑换与管理。

item.title: 《哪吒》导演饺子以 154.46 亿年度票房登顶中国影史导演榜首
item.guid: 《哪吒》导演饺子以-154.46-亿年度票房登顶中国影史导演榜首
item.description:
According to Maoyan Professional data, director Jiaozi, with works such as "Nezha: The Devil Boy's Havoc in the Sea," has accumulated a total box office of 15.446 billion this year, officially becoming the highest-grossing director in Chinese film history. 猫眼专业版数据显示，导演饺子凭借《哪吒之魔童闹海》等作品，今年累计票房达到 154.46 亿，正式成为中国影史票房最高导演。

As of December 13, this year's total Chinese film box office (including pre-sales) has exceeded 50 billion. "Nezha: The Devil Boy's Havoc in the Sea" ranks first in the annual box office chart, followed by "Detective Chinatown 1900," "Zootopia 2," "Nanjing Photo Studio," and "731." 截至 12 月 13 日，今年中国电影大盘（含预售）已突破 500 亿。《哪吒之魔童闹海》在年度票房榜中位列第一，《唐探 1900》《疯狂动物城 2》《南京照相馆》《731》分列其后。

This year, animated films also performed brilliantly, with the annual animated film box office exceeding 25 billion, setting a new record in Chinese film history. "Nezha: The Devil Boy's Havoc in the Sea," "Zootopia 2," and "The Little Monster of Langlang Mountain" ranked among the top three animated film box office earners. 今年动画电影整体表现同样亮眼，全年动画电影票房突破 250 亿，创下中国影史新纪录。《哪吒之魔童闹海》《疯狂动物城 2》《浪浪山小妖怪》位列动画电影票房前三。

item.title: 古天乐监制《寻秦记》电影版登陆院线
item.guid: 古天乐监制《寻秦记》电影版登陆院线
item.description:
The film "A Step into the Past" officially premiered yesterday in mainland China. The film is executive produced by Louis Koo and adapted from Huang Yi's novel of the same name. 电影《寻秦记》已于昨天在中国内地正式上映。影片由古天乐担任总监制，改编自黄易同名小说。

As a classic IP adaptation spanning twenty-five years, the film continues the emotions and destinies of the series' core characters with a new storyline, revolving around Xiang Shaolong's life after retirement, where he once again joins forces with the King of Qin to fight enemies due to a time-space crisis. 作为一部跨越二十五年的经典 IP 改编作品，影片以全新故事线延续剧集核心人物的情感与命运，围绕项少龙归隐后的生活展开，他因一场时空危机再度与秦王携手抗敌。

As a shared cultural memory for those born in the 70s to 90s, "A Step into the Past" had a widespread impact in school and family settings when it aired in 2001. The film retains the core relationship lines of the original work and the series in its narrative, and strengthens the audience's emotional memory points through character reunions. 作为 70 后至 90 后共同的文化记忆，《寻秦记》在 2001 年播出时曾在校园与家庭场景中形成广泛影响力。影片在叙事中保留了原作与剧集的核心关系线，并通过角色重逢强化观众的情感记忆点。

item.title: 《铁血战士：杀戮之地》1 月 6 日上线流媒体
item.guid: 《铁血战士：杀戮之地》1-月-6-日上线流媒体
item.description:
The sci-fi thriller "Predator: Killing Ground" has officially announced its digital platform release on January 6, with Blu-ray and DVD versions planned for February 17. 科幻惊悚电影《铁血战士：杀戮之地》正式宣布将于 1 月 6 日上线数字平台，并计划于 2 月 17 日发行蓝光及 DVD 版本。

The film previously premiered on November 7 last year in mainland China, North America, and other markets, with a cumulative global box office of $184.2 million, of which the North American market contributed $91 million, and the mainland box office recorded 109 million yuan. This achievement set a new record for the highest single-film box office in the "Predator" series' 38-year history. 该片此前于去年 11 月 7 日在中国内地及北美等市场公映，全球累计票房达到 1.842 亿美元，其中北美市场贡献 9100 万美元，内地票房录得 1.09 亿元，这一成绩刷新了「铁血战士」系列诞生 38 年以来的最高单片票房纪录。
